page.title: 06INDUSTRY
page.content: The main industrial activity in the area takes place on the Hobson Colly Industrial Estate,near Pickering Nook,on the A692. For our survey in July 1985 we noted the following small firms on the Estate. {A bakery firm specialising in pie {making. { A builder's merchants. { A garage both for the sale of petrol {and cars but no facilities for repair. { A firm sharpening lawn mowers etc. { A metal packaging company. { A transport firm. A scrap yard. { A sheet metal producing factory. { A firm of upholsterers. {An electronics firm. { A firm producing surgical and {medical equipment. { A taxi firm. {
